search_input: Whether you are going up or going down, a staircase takes you to another level and to somewhere new, so it is important that its design should both reflect and generate a sense of anticipation and excitement.
suggested_query: As you climb the stairs, your eyes are drawn to the subtle curves of the railing, the gentle slope of the steps, and the way the light pours in from above, all of which conspire to create a sense of upward momentum.
suggest_context: Whether you are going up or going down, a staircase takes you to another level and to somewhere new, so it is important that its design should both reflect and generate a sense of anticipation and excitement.
